TopicTitle: What are some mods that add more purpose to build and launch satellites?

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I recently installed Scansat on my career mode and I like that it makes probes have a bigger purpose than just a relay network or science crafts. Are there any other mods that add more functionality to probes? I would love to hear them

Edited December 5, 2021 by Jokpau Gaming

Kerbalism adds the  ability to need time for Science. For example: in stock you need only one click and you have all science. A satellite then is useless. In Kerbalism you start to collect science and it can take hours, days or month. But it works in the background.

Thank you for showing it to me! I will be sure to add it too my career mode save. I might have to start the career mode all new again, but that doesn't really matter, because I only did flybys of mun and minmus.
